author: By Benet Wilson
title: Online Check-In for US Airways
text:
A US Airways Airbus A330. Photo courtesy of Airbus Checking in online is the best and easiest way to ensure you get the seat that you want. US Airways makes it simple, whether you do it via your smartphone, tablet or laptop computer. The carrier allows passengers to check in beginning 24 hours and up to 45 minutes before your flight, but 90 minutes for international flights.
It takes two simple steps to check in :
Type in your confirmation code or ticket number; Choose you day of departure. Once you click the big red check in button, you have the chance to check and switch your seats. Once that's done, you can either print out your boarding pass or download it to your smartphone or tablet . Simple!
This post offers phone numbers to U.S. carriers.
